trans-unit.source: Determine data protection requirements
trans-unit.target: Determine data protection requirements

trans-unit.source: In the age of mobility, most companies have a common goal: enable their users to be productive on their mobile devices while on-premises or remotely from anywhere in order to increase productivity.
trans-unit.target: In the age of mobility, most companies have a common goal: enable their users to be productive on their mobile devices while on-premises or remotely from anywhere in order to increase productivity.

trans-unit.source: While this could be a common goal, companies that have such requirement will also be concern regarding the amount of threats that must be mitigated in order to keep company’s data secure and maintain user’s privacy.
trans-unit.target: While this could be a common goal, companies that have such requirement will also be concern regarding the amount of threats that must be mitigated in order to keep company’s data secure and maintain user’s privacy.

trans-unit.source: Each company might have different requirements in this regard; different compliance rules that will vary according to which industry the company is acting will lead to different design decisions.
trans-unit.target: Each company might have different requirements in this regard; different compliance rules that will vary according to which industry the company is acting will lead to different design decisions.

trans-unit.source: However, there are some security aspects that should be explored and validated, regardless of the industry, which are explained in the next section.
trans-unit.target: However, there are some security aspects that should be explored and validated, regardless of the industry, which are explained in the next section.

trans-unit.source: When planning your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered according to your organization’s requirements:
trans-unit.target: When planning your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered according to your organization’s requirements:

trans-unit.source: Data protection at rest
trans-unit.target: Data protection at rest

trans-unit.source: Regardless of where the data is at rest (device, cloud or on-premises), it is important to perform an assessment to understand the organization needs in this regard.
trans-unit.target: Regardless of where the data is at rest (device, cloud or on-premises), it is important to perform an assessment to understand the organization needs in this regard.

trans-unit.source: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:
trans-unit.target: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to protect data at rest?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to protect data at rest?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with your current on-premises infrastructure?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with your current on-premises infrastructure?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with your workloads located in the cloud?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with your workloads located in the cloud?

trans-unit.source: Is the cloud identity management able to protect the user’s credentials and other data stored in the cloud?
trans-unit.target: Is the cloud identity management able to protect the user’s credentials and other data stored in the cloud?

trans-unit.source: Data protection in transit
trans-unit.target: Data protection in transit

trans-unit.source: Data in transit between the device and the datacenter or between the device and the cloud must be protected.
trans-unit.target: Data in transit between the device and the datacenter or between the device and the cloud must be protected.

trans-unit.source: However, being in-transit does not necessarily mean a communications process with a component outside of your cloud service; it moves internally, also, such as between two virtual networks.
trans-unit.target: However, being in-transit does not necessarily mean a communications process with a component outside of your cloud service; it moves internally, also, such as between two virtual networks.

trans-unit.source: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:
trans-unit.target: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to protect data in transit?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to protect data in transit?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with secure controls such as SSL/TLS?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the hybrid identity solution able to integrate with secure controls such as SSL/TLS?

trans-unit.source: Does the cloud identity management keep the traffic to and within the directory store (within and between datacenters) signed?
trans-unit.target: Does the cloud identity management keep the traffic to and within the directory store (within and between datacenters) signed?

trans-unit.source: Compliance
trans-unit.target: Compliance

trans-unit.source: Regulations, laws and regulatory compliance requirements will vary according to the industry that your company belongs.
trans-unit.target: Regulations, laws and regulatory compliance requirements will vary according to the industry that your company belongs.

trans-unit.source: Companies in high regulated industries must address identity-management concerns related to compliance issues.
trans-unit.target: Companies in high regulated industries must address identity-management concerns related to compliance issues.

trans-unit.source: Regulations such as Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) and the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) are very strict regarding identity and access.
trans-unit.target: Regulations such as Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) and the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) are very strict regarding identity and access.

trans-unit.source: The hybrid identity solution that your company will adopt must have the core capabilities that will fulfill the requirements of one or more of these regulations.
trans-unit.target: The hybrid identity solution that your company will adopt must have the core capabilities that will fulfill the requirements of one or more of these regulations.

trans-unit.source: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:
trans-unit.target: For this area, ensure that the following questions are asked:

trans-unit.source: Is the hybrid identity solution compliant with the regulatory requirements for your business?
trans-unit.target: Is the hybrid identity solution compliant with the regulatory requirements for your business?

trans-unit.source: Does the hybrid identity solution has built in capabilities that will enable your company to be compliant regulatory requirements?
trans-unit.target: Does the hybrid identity solution has built in capabilities that will enable your company to be compliant regulatory requirements?

trans-unit.source: Make sure to take notes of each answer and understand the rationale behind the answer.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to take notes of each answer and understand the rationale behind the answer.

trans-unit.source: By having answered those questions you will select which option best suits your business needs.
